Module no.ntnu.idatt1002
Package no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite

Class SqlUserDAO

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite.SqlDAO
no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao.sqlite.SqlUserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<User,Long>, UserDAO
public final class SqlUserDAO extends SqlDAO implements UserDAO
This class is an implementation of the UserDAO interface, using SQLite as the underlying data source.
